JobFullDesc: The Microsoft Industry web site has seen explosive growth in the past year and we are looking for a high-energy, customer-obsessed, digitally minded candidate to join the Web Marketing team that supports the Industry web experiences. Using customer and market insights, the ideal candidate will collaborate very closely with partners to lead the web strategy and ensure strategic execution of the mission and vision is successfully achieved. Key responsibilities include defining the web experiences to increase customer satisfaction and deliver against engagement and sign-up intent goals. Along with being customer-focused and having a digital marketing background, key skills that will make you a success in this role include strong communication, project management and teamwork skills and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced, deadline driven and high pressure environment. OUR TEAM: The Web Marketing team has a vision to create engaging experiences that build trust by inspiring, educating, and supporting customers throughout their online experience. Our charter is to manage and continually optimize and test our worldwide web properties to drive engagement, product purchases, leads and trials. We are a fast-paced group with a focus on always advocating for our customers, getting things done, simplifying anything and everything, and having fun doing it.
